extendedInfo.description: The official Flickr Android App.Smile. Everyone gets a free terabyte.That's right, a terabyte of space. Flickr lets you share your photos in brilliant, full resolution from anywhere to any device and anyone.Biggr: Others measure in gigabytes. Flickr guarantees up to 1000x that: a terabyte of space. That's 500,000 photos* to share and enjoy in their beautiful, original quality.Whenevr: Upload once, send to any device, any screen, any friend and any follower.Spectaculr: All of your photos in original quality for upload and download, beautifully displayed.* To be exact, it's actually 537,731 photos at 6.5 megapixels.New to Flickr?  Sign up from your Android device.Flickr Features:1. Full bleed and high-resolution images2. Justified views everywhere3. Sixteen artistically designed filters4. Photo editor that allows you to enhance, draw, crop, add text or retouch your photo to get them just how you want them5. Your photos are always yours on Flickr and we give you complete control of your privacy with every photo you take6. Find and join groups, share photos and join the discussion7. Explore beautiful and interesting photos from the massive Flickr community - nearby or across the globe8. Keep track of where you take photos automatically with geotaggingFlickr!

reviews.title: This is stupid! Not user friendly!
reviews.comment: Why no auto upload multiple photos? I can\'t spend all day uploaded one photo at a time. How do you delete pictures?! Fix soon or I\'m going back to Photo Bucket.
reviews.author: Mark Walker

reviews.title: Lovely app with more than a few quirks...
reviews.comment: I like the app, but despite not being a port, it\'s half designed like an iOS app and a few choices wouldn\'t make sense on either platform. I feel even a quick look at the design guidelines could have fixed a lot of this.
reviews.author: Trevor Howard

reviews.title: Log in trouble
reviews.comment: When I try to log in with my google account, it redirects me to a page where I can cancel or accept but the accept button isn\'t solid blue it kind of grayed out and wont let me press accept
reviews.author: Dom Magnelli

reviews.title: such a great app but
reviews.comment: superb ui photo image browsing is such a fast .. its my personal back up solution. but please add batch or set download at least for my own pictures... please allow us to batch edit sets after pics upload
reviews.author: Anoop Asokan

reviews.title: Google login fail
reviews.comment: Wow, wasn\'t working on iPhone 6 months ago - and still not working on android now. No wonder nobody cares about a free terabyte. Dropbox, everpix, loom actually work.
reviews.author: Shane Fenton

reviews.title: Was good
reviews.comment: I did like the update but now it says I havent uploaded any photos, im not a member in any groups and it says all my contacts are out taking photos... its not good!
reviews.author: Harry Harrison

reviews.title: Tablets you dolts
reviews.comment: People look at photos on tablets too. Your new CEO has her work cut out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Much better!
reviews.comment: With the new update I finally have no issues uploading photos from my phone! My only gripe, which drops the score down to 4 stars, is that the app is a little slow sometimes. Other than that it works perfectly now!
reviews.author: Daniel Podobinski

reviews.title: No real-time filter like iOS.. Why????
reviews.comment: So how come the #Android update to the #Flickr app does not have the real-time filter view on the camera but #iOS does?
reviews.author: John Stock

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: App works excellent on my phone. The update also allows me to reply to comments using @ like on instagram. Thank you for a brilliant update :)
reviews.author: Dean Brown

reviews.comment: Terrible...you can\'t search your own photostream. I have 26000 tagged photos ..... how am I supposed to find something?
reviews.author: Brad Henderson

reviews.title: Facebook Login Fail Still
reviews.comment: That update was useless. Trying to sign in using Facebook, doesn\'t work. Clicking the Facebook link just leads to an error message.
reviews.author: Michael Austin DeCesare

reviews.title: Cannot connect with google
reviews.comment: Cannot log in with google. I can sign in but when I have to give permission both buttons are greyed out. Only thing that works is to sign out again...
reviews.author: Baczo Zsolt

reviews.title: Flickr flys fabulously
reviews.comment: Best photo app and community I\'ve ever experienced. Been a pro member for years and have never looked back.
reviews.author: Richard Thietje

reviews.title: Functionality: none
reviews.comment: Very not user friendly. Can\'t upload multiple photos. Not to mention the non existing autoupload feature.
reviews.author: Lucian Tudora

reviews.title: Suddenly nothing.
reviews.comment: I\'m not sure if it was due to an update, but it looks as though I have no contacts and no photos.  I\'m good on the PC, but app thinks I\'m a new user.
reviews.author: Mike Madden

reviews.title: Still needs some work
reviews.comment: If i upload a photo as private, I cannot see it later on my profile. Also, I would enjoy the option to save a photo while browsing.
reviews.author: Horea Fodor

reviews.title: Very disappointing
reviews.comment: I was very excited to hear about the flickr changes including an overhauled android app, add this would be perfect for my needs. It simply isn\'t performing though - while attempting to upload photos, it attempts to upload the same, first photo in the queue over and over again. Has also crashed several times.  Please refine the app, as I would very much like to see it working add it should. On nexus 7. Also, using a very slow internet connection - not sure if that\'s related to the bugs I\'m seeing.
reviews.author: Simon Grant

reviews.title: Useless. Uninstalled.
reviews.comment: Can\'t share photos except for a handful of selected social media sites. No value to me whatsoever. I suppose it is fine if Facebook and Twitter define your world, but I uninstalled it after being foiled and frustrated for twenty minutes.
reviews.author: Mike Broderick

reviews.title: Improved
reviews.comment: Has got good since new ceo
reviews.author: Mark Hooper
